DataElement.preferredName: Genetic Testing SDH Complex Gene Mutation Germline Mutation Order Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date on which a SDHx germline mutation genetic testing was ordered.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Genetic Testing SDH Complex Gene Mutation Germline Mutation Order
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The process of isolating and testing the DNA of an embryo or a person to detect the presence of genetic alterations or defects that may predispose to the future development of a disease or disorder._A change in the nucleotide sequence of any gene that encodes one of the proteins in the succinate dehydrogenase (SDH) complex._Any mutation that appears in the gametes and which will therefore be transmitted to the progeny with some frequency._The act of requesting that a person, business, or organization do or supply something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Analyzing DNA to look for a genetic alteration that may indicate an increased risk for developing a specific disease or disorder.

Concepts.definition: The process of isolating and testing the DNA of an embryo or a person to detect the presence of genetic alterations or defects that may predispose to the future development of a disease or disorder.

Property.preferredName: SDH Complex Gene Mutation Germline Mutation Order
Property.preferredDefinition: A change in the nucleotide sequence of any gene that encodes one of the proteins in the succinate dehydrogenase (SDH) complex.:Any mutation that appears in the gametes and which will therefore be transmitted to the progeny with some frequency.:The act of requesting that a person, business, or organization do or supply something.

Concepts.definition: A change in the nucleotide sequence of any gene that encodes one of the proteins in the succinate dehydrogenase (SDH) complex.
Any mutation that appears in the gametes and which will therefore be transmitted to the progeny with some frequency.
The act of requesting that a person, business, or organization do or supply something.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 3/5/2020: CM Released as part of draft content review

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
